title: Searching for team
body:
Fairly active silver player willing to join a team with any rank i would say i play most roles decently however in order of strongest i would say top,adc,mid,jg,sup is about right. Well if you are interested and looking for a member add me and we can play a normal or something and hopefully i meet your standards.
(ign hashashin if you didnt bother reading right above the text)

replies.body: well our team is 8 wins 12 loses and sorry but more active plat players added me and joined. And im pretty sure i never even invited you to the ranked team so i dont know when we would of played together ranked teams. Checking however your page you do seem to be a bit angry probably shouldn't be dishing it out on random people

this is akward because in one of your ranked teams called "fatkidsareeasytokite" you have 1 game 0 wins and in that game you played with youaredead....

lieing makes you look sus bro =/ just saying

there you go{{summoner:4}}

Oh my bad i must of forgot about it being that i only played 1 game with that team if you however check the teams i am in you can see that i am actually in cereal killers the team i am talking about and it is the only team in which i am the captain. So if you got kicked from fatkidsareeasytokite i dont know why you are typing here because i have no control over who they kick

dont bother to play with this guy,
 I played with this guy once in team ranked, everyone not doing well, he didnt say a single word and kick me out rofl
He is silver 5 btw
